name: IBC Corporate Solutions LTD
goal: Providing clients with the consulting services, tax advisory, management services as well as providing legal assistance in relocation and business expansion in the most reputable jurisdictions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
EU Directive 2015/849 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 May 2015 in relation to the prevention of the use of the financial system for the purposes of money laundering and the financing of terrorism (the so-called ‘4th EU AML Directive’)
Directive DI144-2007-08(A) of 2016 regarding the prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing
Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) 15 Point Action Plan
